name: Ghost n Demon
description:
This game is a prototype made by JiwaDeadliner Team.  This game is only a prototype and only consist of two level, Tutorial and Level One. Please rate this game if you want us to fully develop this game into something special :)

P.S: This game is made in a very short time so expect a lot of bugs. I hope u still enjoy this game anyway :).

Control :

Move Right :  "D"
Move Left : "A"
Jump : "Space"
Switch Character :  Press 1 for Demon, Press 2 for Ghost
Shoot Projectile : Because demon are a mysterious creature to shoot right press N and press A. To shoot left press N and press D. Dont worry you'll get the hang of it  ; ).

Tutorial : to open the brown door find the red button by going to place you start. to open the red door change into demon and shoot the projectile at the door. to penetrate the wall to reach the red button change into ghost and press R or T finish level one before the timer runs out (300second).
